creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Abstraction featuring twisted tree limb on L; an elongated head with one eye, a nose and funnel-shaped mouth at center; four-pointed star, UR; other unidentified objects, LR and UC
inscription: Inscribed in pencil,  LR: rejected first version
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1992.
title: The Night Watchman
